author: vkhristenko
body:
HCAL HLT Calibration/Event Type Filter updates provided.

Changes:
- HcalUHTRData class has been updated with a method to extract the event type.
- HLTHcalCalibTypeFilter has been rewritten to simply accumulate the number of zeroes (Normal/Collision type) and the number of positives (calibration type). 
  Since EDFilter::filter has a bool in the return type, we do not need to differentiate between the Hcal Pedestal/laser types at the HLT level => code is simplified

For earlier data in 2016, there would be a mismatch seen in the calibration type and edm::LogWarning would be present, that is the result of HBHE FEDs (which are majority among HCAL FEDs) to have incorrect event type being delivered, that has been fixed and most recent data 2016 B,C,E,F is fine.

VK
title: HLT Calibration Event Type Filter for HCAL
